title: Another suspect surrenders in playground shooting
content:
NEW ORLEANS -- Another suspect wanted in connection with the Bunny Friend playground shooting last month has surrendered to police.
29-year-old Michael "Mack" Allen turned himself over Tuesday evening.
17 people were shot at the Bunny Friend playground on Nov. 22.
Of the seven suspects implicated in the case, just Wilfred "Lil Wilfred" Celestine, 19, and Quendrick "C4" Bailey, 20, remain at large.
The first man arrested in connection with the crime, Joseph Allen, was cleared of all charges earlier Tuesday.
